Converting older fonts

Older HGE fonts should be converted to the newer format to be usable with HGE 1.6. A command-line tool fontconv.exe is provided for this conversion. You will find it in the Bitmap Font Builder folder. Use the following syntax: 

fontconv *.fnt
*.fnt
Wildcard for font description files to be converted.

The description files will be updated and overwritten. Note that fontconv.exe requires hge.dll and font bitmap files to work.
